entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , London
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:00 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, 0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 10:00 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Condition: Snow
Temperature: 0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: -0.1°C
Wind: ENE 43 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Snow mixed with rain late this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening. Blowing snow. Snowfall amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 9:49 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 9:49 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
